TradingState.docstring:
Máquina de Estados Finita para control Maestro-Aprendiz.

🔴 RECALIBRATION: WinRate < 35% - Trading detenido, LLM diagnostica
🟡 SUPERVISED: 35% <= WinRate <= 70% - NN propone, LLM aprueba
🟢 AUTONOMOUS: WinRate > 70% - NN ejecuta, LLM audita post-mortem

TradeRecord.docstring: Registro de trade para cálculo de WinRate.

PerformanceTracker.docstring:
Rastrea el rendimiento de la NN para determinar el estado del FSM.
Usa ventana deslizante de últimos N trades.

StrategyCommander.docstring:
MODELO 3: EL COMANDANTE DE ESTRATEGIA
Orquesta la lgica de decisin, riesgo y ejecucin basada en FSM.

functions.name: run_cmd
functions.docstring: Ejecuta un comando con opcin de streaming en vivo para evitar bloqueos visuales.

functions.docstring: Finds and terminates other running instances of this script to avoid port/resource conflicts.

functions.docstring: Extracts classes, functions, and docstrings from a python file.

functions.docstring: Recursively scans the project and builds the index.

functions.name: bin_volume_numba
functions.docstring: High-speed Volume Profile binning.

functions.name: calculate_weighted_kde
functions.docstring: Weighted KDE using effective sample size (n_eff).

functions.name: triple_barrier_label
functions.docstring:
Triple Barrier Method for Institutional Labeling.
- +1: Hits Profit Target
- -1: Hits Stop Loss
-  0: Time Horizon Exhausted (Vertical Barrier)

MT5Connection.docstring:
Singleton connection manager for MetaTrader 5.

Provides a thread-safe (threading.Lock) and non-blocking (anyio.to_thread)
environment for interacting with the synchronous MT5 C-API.

Attributes:
    _instance: Singleton instance.
    _lock: Singleton lifecycle lock.
    _mt5_lock: API access synchronization lock.
    _watchdog_task: Background connectivity monitor.

ObservabilityEngine.docstring: Controlador maestro de telemetra y mtricas institucionales.

functions.name: resilient
functions.docstring:
Decorador de grado industrial para resiliencia (Circuit Breaker + Retries).

Args:
    max_retries: Reintentos inmediatos con jitter.
    failure_threshold: Fallos necesarios para abrir el circuito.
    recovery_timeout: Segundos antes de pasar a HALF_OPEN.

OrderValidator.docstring: Motor de validacin inteligente para rdenes de trading y gestin de riesgo.

ZMQProjector.docstring:
Projector sends 'HUD' updates to MT5 using ZMQ Publish pattern.
MT5 acts as a Subscriber to this feed.

SQLiteWALConnection.docstring:
Thread-safe SQLite connection with WAL mode.
Permite lecturas y escrituras simultneas.

OracleLabeler.docstring:
Oracle que etiqueta datos mirando N velas hacia el futuro.
Usa queries SQL eficientes en lugar de cargar todo en memoria.

DataCollector.docstring: Colector principal con batch inserts para alta frecuencia.

functions.name: compute_real_cvd
functions.docstring:
Calcula CVD (Cumulative Volume Delta) real usando flags de MT5.

A diferencia de la aproximación tick-rule, esto usa los flags reales
de MT5 que indican si cada tick fue una compra o venta agresiva.

Args:
    tick_df: DataFrame de ticks con columnas 'volume', 'is_buy', 'is_sell'
    
Returns:
    Dict con métricas CVD:
    - cvd: Valor acumulado final
    - cvd_series: Serie temporal del CVD
    - buy_volume: Volumen total de compras
    - sell_volume: Volumen total de ventas
    - imbalance_ratio: Ratio de desbalance (-1 a 1)
    - acceleration: Tasa de cambio del CVD

FractalAnalyzer.docstring: Computes fractal metrics for a given time series.

ModelLoader.docstring:
Secure model loader with cryptographic-grade fallback and dynamic asset identification.

Handles both joblib (Scikit-Learn) and torch models with state-dict reconstruction.

NormalizationGuard.docstring:
Validates data scales and feature ranges before inference.

Prevents garbage-in-garbage-out by checking ATR-relative scales
and detecting statistical drift in input features.

AnomalyDetector.docstring:
IsolationForest-based anomaly detection for market manipulation.

Identifies non-linear erratic behavior and volumetric anomalies.

ShadowLogger.docstring: Logger para predicciones en Shadow Mode.

MLEngine.docstring:
Master ML Inference Engine with Asset Identity Protocol.

Orchestrates ensemble predictions from GBM and LSTM models
while enforcing statistical and behavioral safety guards.

ATRNormalizer.docstring:
Normalizes market data using ATR (Average True Range).

Benefits:
- Asset-agnostic features (model trained on Gold works on Euro)
- Scale-invariant signals (pip differences become irrelevant)
- Better generalization across volatility regimes

functions.name: get_asset_profile
functions.docstring:
Get asset profile for normalization and context.
Returns default profile if symbol not found.

MultiTimeLearningManager.docstring:
Orchestrates datasets and dynamic weights for MTF Intelligence.

Now with killzone awareness for H4 weight boosting.

BayesianPriors.docstring:
Adaptive priors based on domain knowledge.

These are initialized with your expert knowledge and adjusted
nightly based on actual performance.

TemporalFeatureGenerator.docstring: Generates ML-ready feature vectors from temporal and market data.

functions.docstring: Generates Multifractal Features and returns X, y.

functions.docstring: Loads CSV and computes features.

functions.name: load_from_sqlite
functions.docstring: Loads raw OHLC from SQLite and computes features.

functions.name: train_gbm
functions.docstring:
Entrena GradientBoostingClassifier con TimeSeriesSplit.

Objetivo: Minimizar LogLoss para clasificacin binaria.
Validacin: Walk-forward para evitar look-ahead bias.

Returns:
    Path al modelo guardado

functions.name: train_lstm
functions.docstring:
Entrena LSTM con Attention para capturar patrones secuenciales.

Arquitectura:
- LSTM bidireccional con 2 capas
- Self-Attention para ponderar velas relevantes
- Clasificacin binaria (WIN/LOSS)

Returns:
    Path al modelo guardado

N8NBridge.docstring: Puente de comunicación con n8n para el ciclo RLAIF.

RAGMemory.docstring:
Singleton para gestin de memoria RAG.

Uso:
    from app.services.rag_memory import rag_memory
    
    # Almacenar
    rag_memory.store("El EUR/USD tiene soporte en 1.0850", category="analysis")
    
    # Buscar
    results = rag_memory.search("soporte EUR/USD", k=5)
    
    # Olvidar
    rag_memory.forget(category="analysis")

TheVault.docstring:
Sistema de protección de capital estilo "banco".

Al duplicar el capital inicial:
- 50% de las ganancias se "bloquean" (vault_balance)
- 50% se reinvierten para interés compuesto
- Se genera alerta para transferir a cuenta de resguardo

RiskEngine.docstring:
Institutional Risk Management Engine.
Handles adaptive lot sizing, drawdown protection, exposure limits, and Vault integration.

SupabaseSync.docstring:

Orchestrates signal logging, institutional tick auditing, and performance
tracking with built-in circuit breakers for cloud-latency resilience.

Detecta si hubo un Fakeout en un nivel.
Fakeout = precio rompe nivel pero cierra con mecha volviendo al rango.

FEAT MODULE A: Validacin de Momentum (Chrono-Aware).

Confirma si hay aceleracin real o es una trampa.
Este es el ltimo filtro antes de ejecutar.

Calcula si el precio est en Premium (vender) o Discount (comprar).
Equilibrium = 50%

functions.docstring:
FEAT MODULE E: Mapeo de Zonas de Liquidez (Chrono-Aware).

Busca FVGs, Order Blocks y calcula Premium/Discount.
Integra contexto temporal para validar calidad de zonas.

functions.name: generate_liquidity_features
functions.docstring: Genera vector de features de liquidez para ML.

functions.name: find_swing_points
functions.docstring: Identifica Swing Highs y Swing Lows usando mtodo N-velas.

functions.name: detect_structure
functions.docstring:
Analiza secuencia de swing points para determinar tendencia.

Returns:
    Tuple[Trend, reason, confidence_score]

functions.name: detect_bos_choch
functions.docstring:
Detecta BOS/CHoCH con validacin temporal.

REGLA CRTICA: 
- Solo cuenta como BOS si el CUERPO cierra ms all del nivel
- Una MECHA es un SWEEP (toma de liquidez), no un BOS
- En INDUCTION (Lunes), los BOS tienen menor confianza

functions.name: detect_wyckoff_phase
functions.docstring: Identifica fase de Wyckoff con score de confianza.

functions.name: analyze_forma
functions.docstring:
FEAT MODULE F: Anlisis de Estructura de Mercado (Chrono-Aware).

Analiza en 3 temporalidades (fractalidad):
- Macro (H4): Tendencia dominante
- Intermedio (H1): Estructura operativa
- Micro (M15): Confirmaciones tempranas

INTEGRA contexto temporal de Module T para validar seales.

functions.name: generate_structure_features
functions.docstring: Genera vector de features para ML desde anlisis estructural.

- H4 aligned, D1 neutral = 50% size
- D1 contrary = AVOID or minimal size

Smoothed Moving Average (SMMA).

+1.0 = All bullish aligned
-1.0 = All bearish aligned
0.0 = Conflict or neutral

Construye un tensor de estado de mercado multidimensional.
Capas: Macro (H4/D1), Structural (H1/M15), Execution (M5/M1)

functions.docstring:

functions.name: is_in_kill_zone
functions.docstring: Verifica si estamos dentro de una Kill Zone especfica.

functions.name: detect_liquidity_pools
functions.docstring:
Detecta piscinas de liquidez basadas en Swing Highs/Lows no mitigados.

Args:
    candles: DataFrame con columnas ['high', 'low', 'close', 'time']
    lookback: Nmero de velas a analizar
    min_touches: Mnimo de toques para considerar zona vlida
    
Returns:
    Dict con liquidity_above, liquidity_below, y pools list

functions.name: detect_asian_sweep
functions.docstring:
Detecta si el precio ha barrido (sweep) el rango de la sesin asitica.

Un sweep ocurre cuando el precio rompe el High/Low de Asia y 
luego vuelve a entrar en el rango con fuerza.

functions.name: detect_fvg
functions.docstring:
Detecta Fair Value Gaps (FVG) - zonas de ineficiencia de precio.

Bullish FVG: Candle1.high < Candle3.low (gap alcista)
Bearish FVG: Candle1.low > Candle3.high (gap bajista)

functions.name: calculate_body_wick_ratio
functions.docstring:
Calcula el ratio Cuerpo/Mecha de una vela.
Velas de intencin tienen > 70% cuerpo.

functions.name: is_intention_candle
functions.docstring: Determina si una vela es de "intencin" (cuerpo > 70% del rango).

functions.name: validate_percentiles
functions.docstring:
Phase 1: Validate percentile calculations.

Tests:
- P20, P50, P80 accuracy against numpy reference
- Rolling buffer correctness
- Threshold application in FSM context

functions.name: validate_ema_feat
functions.docstring:
Phase 2: Validate EMA and FEAT calculations.

Tests:
- Compression ratio calculation
- Curvature detection (Form)
- Distance metrics (Space)
- Acceleration detection

functions.name: validate_liquidity
functions.docstring:
Phase 3: Validate liquidity detection.

Tests:
- Swing high/low detection
- Equal level identification
- FVG (imbalance) detection
- Mitigation tracking

functions.name: validate_fsm
functions.docstring:
Phase 4: Validate Finite State Machine.

Tests:
- State transitions are deterministic
- Correct classification of known scenarios
- Hysteresis prevents flip-flop
- Percentile integration works

functions.name: validate_efficiency
functions.docstring:
Phase 5: Validate computational efficiency.

Tests:
- Average execution time per tick < 1ms
- Memory efficiency (no reallocation)
- Reproducibility

functions.name: validate_extreme_cases
functions.docstring:
Phase 6: Validate behavior under extreme conditions.

Tests:
- Gaps: TrueRange > 3*ATR
- Zero volume
- High volatility spikes
- Edge values (0, inf, nan handling)

functions.name: run_full_validation
functions.docstring: Run complete mathematical validation suite.

OptunaOptimizer.docstring:
Bayesian optimization for FSM thresholds using Optuna.

Advantages over brute force:
1. Intelligent sampling with TPE (Tree-structured Parzen Estimator)
2. Early pruning of unpromising trials
3. Parallelizable
4. Built-in visualization

functions.name: run_quick_optimization
functions.docstring:
Quick optimization with default settings.

Args:
    effort: Volume effort array
    result: Price result array
    compression: EMA compression array
    slope: EMA slope array
    speed: Price velocity array
    n_trials: Number of trials

Returns:
    Best ThresholdSet

functions.name: load_and_validate_csv
functions.docstring:
Load data from CSV and validate required columns.

Expected columns:
- time (or timestamp)
- effort (volume/normalized)
- result (price change/atr)
- compression (0-1)
- slope (normalized)
- speed (normalized)
